meanings.definition: A hereditary military dictator of Japan
meanings.sent1: The shoguns led the army in ancient Japan.
meanings.sent2: During feudal times, the shoguns held great power.
meanings.sent3: The shoguns decided to have a friendly archery competition.
meanings.sent4: In history books, the shoguns are portrayed as strong leaders.
meanings.sent5: The image of the shoguns in their armor is iconic.

meanings.definition: The title of the chief military commanders in feudal Japan
meanings.sent1: Many warriors aspired to become shoguns.
meanings.sent2: The shoguns were respected for their strategic skills.
meanings.sent3: The shoguns organized a grand parade for the villagers.
meanings.sent4: The influence of the shoguns extended across the land.
meanings.sent5: Legends were told about the bravery of the shoguns.
